app.name: Snes9x RX
app.long_description: Featuring: - Screenshot/Cover/Artwork display. Swap between them with the +/Z button! - Retrode 2 USB adapter support. - Wii U Pro Controller support. - Wii U Gamepad support through VC injects. - Classic Controllers support (NES / SNES) - MSU-1 audio enhancement chip support. - Sharp / Soft / HQ2X / Scanline filters. - Super FX overclock (20/40/60 MHz). - Wiiflow plugin mode. - FPS counter toggle. - Screenshot button.
